column1: 43096270$Alexandrite Dragon$Unlimited$LIGHT$[Dragon/Normal]$$$$$4$2000$100$$$$Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery
column2: along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not.$$$$$
